verses.roman:
kṛpā kari' kara more pada-dhūli-sama
tomāra sevaka karoṅ tomāra sevana"

synonyms: kṛpā kari'-being merciful; kara—make; more—Me; pada-dhūli-sama—like a particle of dust at Your lotus feet; tomāra sevaka—as I am Your eternal servant; karoṅ—let Me be engaged; tomāra sevana—in Your service.
translation: "Be causelessly merciful to Me by giving Me a place with the particles of dust at Your lotus feet so that I may engage in the service of Your Lordship as Your eternal servant."
